content: **drops crochet shawl in snow with love knots & flower attachment** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **size** one size measurements width at top approx 200 cm / 78 75 length at center back approx 100 cm / 39-3/8 **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 250 gr nr 30 light pink drops 10 mm / us p crochet hook or size needed to obtain correct gauge **pattern links ** norwegian version 1 swedish version 2 1 http //www garnstudio com/lang/no/visoppskrift php d_nr=87&d_id=5&lang=no 2 http //garnstudio com/lang/se/visoppskrift php d_nr=87&d_id=5&lang=se
